service.name: test-genie
service.description: AI-powered comprehensive test generation and management platform

postgres.description: Database for test suite storage, results, and analytics

ollama.description: AI service for intelligent test generation

redis.description: Optional caching for test results and AI responses

qdrant.description: Optional vector database for semantic test similarity

setup.description: Initialize Test Genie with all dependencies and build artifacts

steps.name: verify-resources
steps.run: echo 'üîç Verifying required resources...' && resource-postgres status && resource-ollama status

steps.name: install-go-deps
steps.run: cd api && go mod download

steps.name: build-api
steps.run: cd api && go build -o test-genie-api .

steps.name: install-cli
steps.run: cd cli && ./install.sh

steps.name: install-ui-deps
steps.run: cd ui && npm install

steps.name: setup-database
steps.run: resource-postgres exec --database test_genie --file initialization/storage/postgres/schema.sql

steps.name: verify-ai-models
steps.run: curl -f http://localhost:${OLLAMA_PORT:-11434}/api/tags | jq '.models[] | select(.name | contains("llama")) | .name' | head -1 || echo 'Warning: No Llama models found in Ollama'

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run:
echo '
üöÄ Test Genie initialized successfully!'
echo '  üìä Dashboard: http://localhost:${UI_PORT}'
echo '  üîß API: http://localhost:${API_PORT}'
echo '  üíª CLI: test-genie --help'
echo '  üìö Generate tests: test-genie generate <scenario> --types unit,integration'
echo '  üèóÔ∏è  Create vault: test-genie vault <scenario> --phases setup,develop,test'

develop.description: Start Test Genie services (API and UI)

steps.name: build-api-dev
steps.run: cd api && go build -o test-genie-api .
steps.description: Ensure API binary is up to date before starting

steps.name: start-api
steps.run: cd api && ./test-genie-api
steps.description: Start Go API server in background

steps.name: start-ui
steps.run: cd ui && node server.js

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run:
sleep 3 && echo '
üöÄ Test Genie services started!'
echo '  üìä Dashboard: http://localhost:${UI_PORT}'
echo '  üîß API: http://localhost:${API_PORT}'
echo '  üíª CLI: test-genie --help'
echo '
üí° Quick start:'
echo '  test-genie generate my-scenario --types unit,integration'
echo '  test-genie vault my-scenario --phases setup,develop,test'

steps.name: test-go-compilation
steps.run: cd api && go build -o test-build . && rm test-build

steps.name: test-api-health
steps.run: API_PORT=$(vrooli scenario port test-genie API_PORT 2>/dev/null || echo 17907); curl -f http://localhost:${API_PORT}/health

steps.name: test-ui-health
steps.run: UI_PORT=$(vrooli scenario port test-genie UI_PORT 2>/dev/null || echo 35621); curl -f http://localhost:${UI_PORT}/health

steps.name: test-database-connection
steps.run: API_PORT=$(vrooli scenario port test-genie API_PORT 2>/dev/null || echo 17907); curl -f -X POST http://localhost:${API_PORT}/api/v1/test-analysis/coverage -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"scenario_name":"test","source_code_paths":["."]}' >/dev/null

steps.name: test-ai-integration
steps.run: curl -f http://localhost:${OLLAMA_PORT:-11434}/api/tags >/dev/null

steps.name: test-test-generation
steps.run: API_PORT=$(vrooli scenario port test-genie API_PORT 2>/dev/null || echo 17907); curl -f -X POST http://localhost:${API_PORT}/api/v1/test-suite/generate -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"scenario_name":"test-scenario","test_types":["unit"],"coverage_target":80}' >/dev/null

steps.name: test-cli-commands
steps.run: test-genie status && test-genie generate test-demo --types unit --coverage 80 >/dev/null

steps.name: run-scenario-tests
steps.run: if [ -f scenario-test.yaml ]; then echo 'Scenario-specific tests would run here (currently delegated to phased testing)'; else echo 'Scenario tests not available'; fi

steps.name: stop-api
steps.run: pkill -f "test-genie-api" || true; sleep 1; pkill -9 -f "test-genie-api" 2>/dev/null || true

steps.name: stop-ui
steps.run: pkill -f "scenarios/test-genie.*server\.js" || true; sleep 1; pkill -9 -f "scenarios/test-genie.*server\.js" 2>/dev/null || true

steps.name: cleanup-temp-files
steps.run: find . -name 'test-vault-*' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true; rm -f *.log *.tmp 2>/dev/null || true
steps.description: Clean up temporary files and test vaults
